Subject: Coffee Chat Request to Learn From Your Journey

Hi Piper,

My name is User, and I'm currently a student at Rochester Institute of Technology. I came across your profile while researching Spotify and was really inspired by your work as a software engineer there.

I'm very interested in the tech industry and would really appreciate the chance to learn more about your journey and any advice you may have. I noticed that we both share an educational overlap, having attended Alfred - Almond Junior - Senior High School. It's always great to connect with someone who shares a similar educational background.

If you're open to it, would you be available for a quick 15-20 minute chat sometime this or next week? I'd be grateful for any insights you could share.

Thank you so much for your time, and I look forward to hearing from you!

Best,
